devdoc.details: Marketplace: A contract for listing and buying products

addStoreManager(string,address).details: addStoreManager() A function to add a new store manager ***Restricted to store owner (contract owner)***

params.newManagerAddress: An address data type to add new store manager address
params.newManagerName: A string data type to add a new store manager name

addStoreProduct(string,uint256,uint256).details: addStoreProduct() A function to add a new store product ***Restricted to store manager (authorised by store owner)***

params.newProductName: A string data type to add new store product name
params.newTotalUnits: A uint data type to add new total store product units
params.newUnitPrice: A uint data type to add new store product unit price

buyStoreProduct(uint256).details: buyStoreProduct() A function to buy a store product

params.buyProductID: A uint data type to buy store product associated with store product ID

changeStoreProductPrice(uint256,uint256).details: changeStoreProductPrice() A function to change the price of a store product ***Restricted to store manager (authorised by store owner)***

params.changeProductID: A uint data type to identify the store product to change
params.changeUnitPrice: A uint data type to state the new price of the store product

constructor.details: Declare constructor. Set ownerMarketplace to be the contract creator

emergencyStopFunction(bool).details: emergencyStopFunction() A function that allows setting emergencyStopSwitch (circuit breaker flag) to true or false

params.emergencySwitchValue: A boolean data type for changing the state of emergencyStopSwitch (circuit breaker flag)

emergencyStopFunction(bool).return: A boolean data type returning the new value of emergencyStopSwitch (circuit breaker flag)

readStoreFunds().details: readStoreFunds() A function to read store funds. ***Restricted to store owner (contract owner)***

readStoreProducts(uint256).details: readStoreProducts() A function to read store product data

params.readProductID: A uint data type to read data associated with store product ID

removeStoreManager(address).details: removeStoreManager() A function to remove an old store manager ***Restricted to store owner (contract owner)***

params.oldManagerAddress: An address data type to identify the store manager to remove

removeStoreProduct(uint256).details: removeStoreProduct() A function to remove an old store product ***Restricted to store manager (authorised by store owner)***

params.oldProductID: A uint data type to remove store product associated with store product ID

withdrawStoreFunds().details: withdrawStoreFunds() A function to withdraw store funds. ***Restricted to store owner (contract owner)***
